name: Flavours of Rajasthani Village
description: Treat yourself to the enticing flavours of Rajasthani Village that come alive with this experience. Take a balmy drive into the rustic hamlet to get a whiff of the simple life. Over here, get inspired by the deft artisans as you see them in their element. Delight in the traditional ceremonies and folk performances.  Find serenity in the diya lit temple that reverberates with holy chants. A befitting end is the sumptuous dinner spread of authentic Rajasthani cuisine.
